title: Weather Web App
description: A mini javascript weather web application which display realtime temperature using open weather API. App display other miscelleanuos weather details such as real feal, humidity, sunset and sunrise time and Change its background image according to weather condition using Unsplash API

title: Keep Note
description: Keep Notes is a javascript note taking web application which is mainly inspired by google keep. User can perfom CURD opertation with their notes. User date store on Local storage

title: MOVIElogy
description: Movielogy is An awesome movie details website made using javaScript and TMDB API With this website users can get currently trending movies list with all relevant details/information about that movie such as Overview, Trailer, Cast and Crew details

title: My Portfolio
description: Built my protfolio website using React.js. This website fully responsive and optimized for mobile and tablet screen

title: OKV-Memes
description: Built a video memes website using react.js where you can watch and download popular memes from bollywood to politics for your video editing purpose. Tech stack used: React.js, JavaScript, CSS, HTML.

title: Zomato Clone (UI)
description: Built a fully responsive zomato clone website using react.js. Tech stack used: React.js, JavaScript, CSS, HTML.
